plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_leui
plurals.item: PIN has been entered incorrectly %1$d times. After more %2$d failed attempts, only the PUK may be used.
PIN has been entered incorrectly %1$d time. After more %2$d failed attempts, only the PUK may be used.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code_leui
plurals.item: PUK has been entered incorrectly %1$d times. After more %2$d failed attempts, SIM card will be locked.
PUK has been entered incorrectly %1$d time. After more %2$d failed attempts, SIM card will be locked.
